content:
Sure, here are some more questions for the Geomancy quiz:

1. Which figure in the 4th House indicates a good time for travel?
A) Cauda Draconis
B) Fortuna Major
C) Populus
D) Albus

Answer: D) Albus. Albus in the 4th House indicates a good time for travel, as it represents journeys and movement.

2. What does it mean if Rubeus appears in the 2nd House?
A) You will experience financial loss
B) You will receive an unexpected gift
C) You will achieve success in your career
D) You will experience a major life change

Answer: A) You will experience financial loss. Rubeus in the 2nd House represents financial loss or instability.

3. What does it mean if Acquisitio appears in the 10th House?
A) You will experience success in your career
B) You will experience a major life change
C) You will face obstacles in your career
D) You will experience financial loss

Answer: A) You will experience success in your career. Acquisitio in the 10th House represents success, achievement, and recognition in your career.

4. Which figure in the 7th House indicates a good time for partnerships and relationships?
A) Fortuna Minor
B) Caput Draconis
C) Populus
D) Cauda Draconis

Answer: A) Fortuna Minor. Fortuna Minor in the 7th House indicates a good time for partnerships and relationships, as it represents harmony and balance.

5. What does it mean if Tristitia appears in the 12th House?
A) You will experience success in your career
B) You will face obstacles in your relationships
C) You will experience financial loss
D) You will face internal struggles or mental challenges

Answer: D) You will face internal struggles or mental challenges. Tristitia in the 12th House represents isolation, depression, and internal struggles.

Explanation:
In Geomancy, the placement of figures in different houses can have different meanings and implications. For example, the 4th House represents the home and family, while the 2nd House represents money and material possessions. By understanding the meanings of each figure and its placement in a specific house, you can gain insight into different areas of your life and make more informed decisions.
